title: Slasher: Possible Memory leak (alpha-7)
body:
# üêû Bug Report ### Description Slasher (alpha 7) suddenly starts to consume several GB of RAM (on 4GB Raspberry Pi) in only a couple of seconds. ### Has this worked before in a previous version? In alpha-6 slasher was fine. ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction Run beacon-chain, validator and slasher on RPi4 and wait for some time. ## üåç Your Environment **Operating System:** 
  
Raspberry Pi 4 with Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)** 
  
alpha-7
**Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?** I cannot see anything wrong in the logs...

This is related to the lookback changes, unfortunately, the gating for the feature did not make it into alpha7 :(

If you'd like to try the slasher, try alpha6 or use current master. Sorry for the trouble!
